movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
movies.stars: Chris Pratt, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper

movies.title: Logan
movies.description: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, Logan's attempts to hide from the world and his legacy are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.
movies.stars: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen

movies.title: Daddy's Home
movies.description: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.
movies.stars: Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Linda Cardellini

movies.title: Fist Fight
movies.description: When one school teacher unwittingly causes another teacher's dismissal, he is challenged to an after-school fight.
movies.stars: Ice Cube, Charlie Day, Tracy Morgan

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.
movies.stars: Alicia Vikander, Domhnall Gleeson, Oscar Isaac

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty hunger, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
movies.stars: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio

news.title: Warner Bros' Six Billion Dollar Man Release Date Removed From Schedule
news.description: Warner Bros' removes Mark Wahlberg's The Six Billion Dollar Man, the long-gestating and apparently stalled remake, from their 2020 release schedule.

news.title: Wonder Woman 1984 Release Pushed From November 2019 To June 2020
news.description: Warner Bros' highly anticipated DC sequel Wonder Woman 1984 is moving to a summer 2020 release date after previously securing a late 2019 slot.

news.title: Joker Movie Actor Shea Whigham Reveals Who He Plays
news.description: Shea Whigham reveals some details for his character from Joker, calling the Joaquin Phoenix-headlined DC comic book movie an 'experience'.

news.title: Ryan Meinerding & Andy Park Interview: Designing Spider-Man's Suit
news.description: We interview Marvel Studios' Ryan Meinerding and Andy Park about the work the do designing elements for Marvel's movies, including Spider-Man's suit.

news.title: Chris Hemsworth Picked Up A Hitchhiker & Gave Him A Helicopter Lift
news.description: Thor actor Chris Hemsworth documents picking up a hitchhiking musician and ending up giving him a lift to his destination via helicopter.

news.title: What Iron Man's New Avengers 4 Armor Could Look Like
news.description: New fan art imagines what the new Iron Man suit in Avengers 4 could look like by combining all supposed leaked details about the armor.
